title: 2023 Duke-International Society for Cardiovascular Infectious Diseases (ISCVID) Criteria
description: Diagnostic criteria for infective endocarditis, updated from the original Duke criteria with improved sensitivity and specificity.

parameters.name: microbiologic_major_typical
parameters.description: Microorganisms that commonly cause IE isolated from 2 or more separate blood culture sets

parameters.name: microbiologic_major_nontypical
parameters.description: Microorganisms that occasionally or rarely cause IE isolated from 3 or more separate blood culture sets

parameters.name: pcr_positive_coxiella_bartonella_tropheryma
parameters.description: Positive PCR or nucleic acid-based technique for Coxiella burnetii, Bartonella species, or Tropheryma whipplei from blood

parameters.name: coxiella_antibody_titer
parameters.description: Coxiella burnetii antiphase I IgG antibody titer >1:800, or isolated from single blood culture

parameters.name: bartonella_antibody_titer
parameters.description: Indirect IFA for Bartonella henselae or quintana with IgG titer ≥1:800

parameters.name: imaging_major_echo_ct
parameters.description: Echocardiography/cardiac CT showing vegetation, perforation, aneurysm, abscess, pseudoaneurysm, or fistula

parameters.name: new_valvular_regurgitation
parameters.description: Significant new valvular regurgitation on echocardiography compared with previous imaging

parameters.name: prosthetic_valve_dehiscence
parameters.description: New partial dehiscence of prosthetic valve compared with previous imaging

parameters.name: pet_ct_abnormal_activity
parameters.description: [18F]FDG PET/CT abnormal metabolic activity involving valve, graft, device leads, or prosthetic material

parameters.name: surgical_evidence
parameters.description: Evidence of IE documented by direct inspection during heart surgery

parameters.name: previous_ie
parameters.description: Previous history of infective endocarditis

parameters.name: prosthetic_valve
parameters.description: Prosthetic valve present

parameters.name: previous_valve_repair
parameters.description: Previous valve repair

parameters.name: congenital_heart_disease
parameters.description: Congenital heart disease

parameters.name: significant_regurgitation_stenosis
parameters.description: More than mild regurgitation or stenosis of any etiology

parameters.name: endovascular_cied
parameters.description: Endovascular cardiac implantable electronic device (CIED)

parameters.name: hypertrophic_cardiomyopathy
parameters.description: Hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy

parameters.name: injection_drug_use
parameters.description: Injection drug use

parameters.name: fever
parameters.description: Fever with documented temperature >38.0°C (100.4°F)

parameters.name: vascular_phenomena
parameters.description: Vascular phenomena (emboli, septic infarcts, mycotic aneurysm, hemorrhage, Janeway lesions)

parameters.name: immunologic_phenomena
parameters.description: Immunologic phenomena (RF+, Osler nodes, Roth spots, glomerulonephritis)

parameters.name: positive_blood_cultures_minor
parameters.description: Positive blood cultures for microorganism consistent with IE but not meeting major criterion

parameters.name: positive_sterile_site_culture
parameters.description: Positive culture/PCR from sterile body site other than cardiac tissue or arterial embolus

parameters.name: pet_ct_within_3_months
parameters.description: Abnormal [18F]FDG PET/CT activity within 3 months of prosthetic material implantation

parameters.name: new_regurgitation_auscultation
parameters.description: New valvular regurgitation on auscultation (if echo not available)

parameters.name: pathologic_microorganisms
parameters.description: Microorganisms identified in vegetation with clinical signs of active endocarditis

parameters.name: pathologic_active_endocarditis
parameters.description: Active endocarditis identified in or on vegetation histologically

result.name: diagnosis
result.description: Duke-ISCVID diagnosis result for infective endocarditis

ranges.description: Meets criteria for definite infective endocarditis
ranges.interpretation: Patient meets Duke-ISCVID criteria for definite infective endocarditis. Appropriate antimicrobial therapy and cardiology/infectious disease consultation recommended.

ranges.description: Meets criteria for possible infective endocarditis
ranges.interpretation: Patient meets Duke-ISCVID criteria for possible infective endocarditis. Further diagnostic workup including repeat echocardiography, blood cultures, and specialist consultation recommended.

ranges.description: Does not meet criteria for infective endocarditis
ranges.interpretation: Patient does not meet Duke-ISCVID criteria for infective endocarditis. Consider alternative diagnoses. Clinical correlation and specialist consultation if high clinical suspicion persists.

references: Fowler VG Jr, Durack DT, Selton-Suty C, et al. The 2023 Duke-International Society for Cardiovascular Infectious Diseases Criteria for Infective Endocarditis: Updating the Modified Duke Criteria. Clin Infect Dis. 2023;77(4):518-526.
Cahill TJ, Baddour LM, Habib G, et al. Challenges in Infective Endocarditis. J Am Coll Cardiol. 2017;69(3):325-344.
Habib G, Lancellotti P, Antunes MJ, et al. 2015 ESC Guidelines for the management of infective endocarditis. Eur Heart J. 2015;36(44):3075-3128.
formula: Diagnostic algorithm based on pathologic criteria (definite if present), major criteria (microbiologic, imaging, surgical), and minor criteria (predisposing conditions, clinical manifestations). Definite IE: 2 major criteria OR 1 major + 3 minor criteria OR 5 minor criteria. Possible IE: 1 major + 1 minor criteria OR 3 minor criteria.
notes: Updated in 2023 to improve diagnostic accuracy over original Duke criteria
Incorporates modern diagnostic techniques including PET/CT imaging and molecular diagnostics
Consider alternative diagnoses if criteria not met but clinical suspicion remains high
